pr_title: KOGITO-3236 DMN validation as part of Kogito CodeGen

timeline.message: refactor to use CollectedResource in preparation for validation work

timeline.bodyText: so you are dropping DMN Resource altogether in favor of this CollectedResource? ok
timeline.author: evacchi

replies.bodyText: can't drop it, since it represents a compiled DMN model and its original resource; but to make them closer I refactored in such a way should be clearer: https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-runtimes/pull/745/files#diff-876e266ffe2528ed349c4a20b12d4d23R30
replies.author: tarilabs

timeline.bodyText: so basically you are introducing this class and isolating the validation logic there; so at some point we may even be able to move it to a shared "validation" phase with other type of assets; is this your intention?
timeline.author: evacchi

replies.bodyText: Once Kogito codegen will offer validation infra for all assets, as long as it's compatible, I have no objections if this code is moved there 👍
replies.author: tarilabs
